db:info.db:title: EnginioReply QML Type
db:info.db:titleabbrev: Client library for Enginio from QML

db:abstract.db:para: A reply to any Enginio request.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The reply, when finished, contains information received from the server:

db:listitem.db:para: Data - object, which is a result from an earlier request, see the data function
Network status - in case of a network problem, additional information can be accessed through: errorType, errorString, networkError
Backend status - a finished request is always associated with a backend status code, which is just an HTTP code, and it can be queried through backendStatus

db:section.db:title: errorString : string
db:section.db:para: The error message if this reply was an error.

db:section.db:title: errorType : Enginio::ErrorType
db:section.db:para: The type of error (if any) of this reply.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] isError : bool
db:section.db:para: The property holds true if this reply has finished with an error, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] isFinished : bool
db:section.db:para: The property holds true if this reply is finished, false otherwise.
